name: __EDynamicMeshVertexColorTransformMode
doc:
Color Transform to apply to Vertex Colors when converting from internal DynamicMesh
Color attributes (eg Color Overlay stored in FVector4f) to RHI Render Buffers (FColor).

Note that UStaticMesh assumes the Source Mesh colors are Linear and always converts to SRGB.

NoTransform: Do not apply any color-space transform to Vertex Colors
LinearToSRGB: Assume Vertex Colors are in Linear space and transform to SRGB
SRGBToLinear: Assume Vertex Colors are in SRGB space and convert to Linear
